name: Deploy a simple Cloudflare edge function with Clodo
description: Quick hands-on steps to deploy a small edge function on Cloudflare and observe latency improvements.

step.name: Create an edge function
step.text: Use Clodo or Cloudflare Workers to create a simple function that returns a personalized response.

step.name: Test locally
step.text: Run the function locally or in a staging worker environment and test with sample requests to verify behavior.

step.name: Deploy and monitor
step.text: Deploy to Cloudflare, measure response times at the edge, and roll out progressively while monitoring performance.
